parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Title
parameter.description:
Title of FAQ section. Default:
Frequently Asked Questions

parameter.name: status
parameter.label: Status of questions
parameter.description:
Choose what status questions to display. By default, there are only 2 options:
0 - inactive;
1 - active (default);
But you can assign different numbers to questions and then create different instances of this widget.
For example:
2 - active questions about return policy;
3 - active questions about the upcoming Black Friday sale;
And then place instances of this widget in different pages with that number as this option's value.
